title: Stylish Duplex Retreat in Vibrant Wola – Urban Chic for Digital Nomads
description: Experience dynamic city living in this contemporary duplex, designed to suit the energy of modern professionals. Spanning 146 sqm, this five-bedroom, three-bathroom residence features an airy open-concept living area, a designer fireplace for cozy evenings, and underfloor heating throughout. Full-height windows flood the home with natural light, complemented by a cutting-edge lighting system for versatile ambiance. Plenty of storage and a private video intercom system boost convenience and security.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in Warsaw’s ultra-urban Wola district, you're in the heart of an artistic and entrepreneurial hub with a buzz for creative communities. Trendy cafes, independent galleries, and essential amenities are all within minutes, plus excellent connections to highways and public transit. Bike-friendly streets and vibrant streetscapes offer endless opportunities to explore the city’s best.
lifestyle_benefits: Steps to coworking spaces and cafes
Excellent transit options for urban mobility
target_buyer: Ambitious digital nomads, creative entrepreneurs, or young professionals who desire a spacious urban base with character and modern comforts.
market_positioning: A rare and competitive duplex tailored for cosmopolitan buyers seeking elevated urban living within easy reach of Warsaw’s vibrant city core and rich cultural pulse.
